messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, not more than 15 mice have migrated into the [REDACTED].
